text: musami āle፡- «gētachini hoyi! ānite leferi‘onina leshumochu bek’iribītu ḥiyiweti gēt’ini bizu genizebochinimi be’irigit’i set’ehi፡፡ gētachini hoyi! kemenigedihi yasasitu zenidi (set’ehachewi)፡፡ gētachini hoyi! genizebochachewini āt’ifa፡፡ belibochachewimi layi ātimi፡፡ āsamamīni k’it’ati isikemīyayu āyaminumina፡፡»
